src_original: vāmamuṣṭiṃ hṛdi dhārya dakṣiṇaṃ ūrdhvaṃ bhrāmayet //
akṣayamater mudrā /  vāme nābhasthitā muṣṭir dakṣiṇe choṭikāṃ dadan //  pratibhānakūṭasya /  vāmamuṣṭiṃ kaṭiṃ dhārya dakṣiṇaratnamuṣṭikā //
tena mantreṇa uccārya hṛdayād utsṛjanti ca //  caturṣu koṇasthāneṣu padmasthacandramaṇḍale //
oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhe dharmate gaganasamudgate svabhāvaviśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā /
